channel.title: POH's Boxing/Dueling Ring Bug
channel.description:
Lol. Me and my friends were dueling upstairs at his house and when you die, you sometimes go either into a black hole area or on the roof. I only got pictures of me and friends on the roof.
Roof = Way better, cuz you can move around it. Black Hole = Funny, but you can't move.
Pictures:
[img]http://img116.imageshack.us/img116/9087/roofglitch2cn.png[/img]
Ok. So I only had one, I forgot. But hey, atleast you get to see what it was like. Not sure if Jagex fixed it or not...
~Dizzy

item.title: POH's Boxing/Dueling Ring Bug
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

people there days… here let me show you something(and martin stop posting in my quotes)

[quote=“Jagex”]Rule 4 - Cheating/Bug Abuse
You must not use or attempt to use any cheats or errors which you find in our software.
Any exploits which you find must be immediately reported to Jagex through Customer Support.[/quote]

hey looky you used the bug, that an serious offense, yeah thats right…

Jagex:

any usage of cheats or bugs, or attempting to discover the existence of any cheats or bugs, is a direct violation of the Rules of Conduct.

yeah, im afraid so

Read full topic

item.title: POH's Boxing/Dueling Ring Bug
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“mjordan, post:9, topic:3636”][quote author=Dizzy link=topic=4406.msg45089#msg45089 date=1149825133]
It’s not a bad bug. it’s not like I can attack people or dupe items becuase of it. Lol… I don’t cheat in runescape anyways.

Besides, practically everybody in runescape already knows about this glitch.
[/quote]

the second part of tha is correct but lyk 30% of the people on these forums dont cheat lol

well dizzy the thing is you are on these forums which are runescape cheating forums so most people dont come to a RUNESCAPE CHEATING FORUM and just hang out, they come to cheat or help cheat. so u posted a screenshot of your account and u didnt edit out the name so when or if jagex sees this post they will probably ban your account. simple as that =)[/quote]

Read full topic
